# Values Docs

- [Values](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/language-reference/values/index.md): Learn how values in F# are quantities that have a specific type.
- [Null Values](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fsharp/language-reference/values/null-values.md): Learn how the null value is used in the F# programming language.
